document_data.mainbody:
Narrak was a derro savant cultist of Demogorgon in Gracklstugh in the late 15 century DR.
Narraks area of expertise was demonology.
Narrak was a junior member of the Council of Savants and a long-time cultist of Demogorgon. 
Circa 1486 DR, he gathered a small retinue of followers and started a plot to deliver the city to the demon lord. The first step in his plan was to curse the stone giants of Clan Clairngorm with Demogorgons madness. He was waiting for a delivery from Droki when an adventuring party escaping from drow slavers of Velkynvelve ruined his plan and defeated him.
